biography: Håkan Pieniowski (born 2 March, 1948; Sweden) is a Swedish documentary filmmaker, director and photographer. Pieniowski was educated at Christer Strömholm photo School in Stockholm 1971-74. He worked as a photographer at the Stockholm City Museum 1975-80. Pieniowski is a member of the image group MIRA and began his film career in 1985.
name: Håkan Pieniowski
